verses.verse: Now <S%H1732>[David<s%>] <S%H6213>built<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> for himself in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of David; and he <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> a <S%H168>tent<s%> for it.

<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>"No<s%> one is to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> but the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> them to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to Him <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>"

<S%H3588>"Because<s%> you did not [carry it] at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6555>made<s%> an <S%H6555>outburst<s%> on us, for we did not <S%H1875>seek<s%> Him according to the <S%H4941>ordinance.<s%>"

So the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> and from his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah;<s%> and from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> their <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6984>Kushaiah,<s%>

So the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> and <S%H387>Ethan<s%> [were appointed] to <S%H8085>sound<s%> aloud <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze;<s%>

And <S%H3663>Chenaniah,<s%> <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> was [in charge of] the <S%H4853>singing;<s%> he <S%H3256>gave<s%> <S%H3256>instruction<s%> in <S%H4853>singing<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he was <S%H995>skillful.<s%>
And <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> were <S%H7778>gatekeepers<s%> for the <S%H727>ark.<s%>
